name: Digital Talking Book.  ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2002
description: NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2002, defines the format and content of the electronic file set that comprises a digital talking book (DTB) and establishes a limited set of requirements for DTB playback devices.
